name: Son of a Gun: Six Feet Under
name_original: Son of a Gun: Six Feet Under
description:
Yo dawg, I heard you like guns. Here's a gun, who is the son of a gun, holding a gun, shooting at guns. 

A roguelike reverse bullet-hell game heavily inspired by Vampire Survivors. Be the gun your father wanted you to be and cleanse the world from the undead masses of your fellow guns infested by the disgusting virus of weapon cosmetics!

Controls:

  • Mouse: move

Credits:

  • Code: KramerZJ
  • Art: Kosina Zoltán
  • Intro, music: WanderingMantisX

Disclaimer:

This game was made for the Game Off 2022 game jam in a month. The theme: Cliché. Some of the features are not finished.

The xp is useless right now, and the coins could be use to buy speed point, strength point and attack speed point.

Shout out to the team: KramerZJ, Kosina Zoltán and WanderingMantisX!

#GitHubGameOff
